description:
Gtk: Fix leaking style objects when using gtk theme.

TEST=run a ui test under valgrind
BUG=none

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=65768

messages.text:
LGTM.

On Wed, Nov 10, 2010 at 5:02 PM,  <mattm@chromium.org> wrote:
> Reviewers: Elliot Glaysher,
>
> Description:
> Gtk: Fix leaking style objects when using gtk theme.
>
> TEST=run a ui test under valgrind
> BUG=none
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.chromium.org/4794001/
>
> SVN Base: svn://svn.chromium.org/chrome/trunk/src
>
> Affected files:
>  M chrome/browser/gtk/gtk_util.cc
>
>
> Index: chrome/browser/gtk/gtk_util.cc
> diff --git a/chrome/browser/gtk/gtk_util.cc b/chrome/browser/gtk/gtk_util.cc
> index
> bb508b7388525f183c7d9e6930d6284f33e37242..3323207c4068f33babef699962aa72aaebf2551b
> 100644
> --- a/chrome/browser/gtk/gtk_util.cc
> +++ b/chrome/browser/gtk/gtk_util.cc
> @@ -776,6 +776,7 @@ void DrawTextEntryBackground(GtkWidget* offscreen_entry,
>                      rec->width - 2 * xborder,
>                      rec->height - 2 * yborder);
>
> +  gtk_style_detach(our_style);
>   g_object_unref(our_style);
>  }
>
>
>
>

subject: Gtk: Fix leaking style objects when using gtk theme.
